item.title: iOS 9 has been released by Apple
item.description:
Source: Apple.Â Apple has announced that its latest mobile operating system, iOS 9, will launch on September 16th. This free update for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch users boasts enhanced search capabilities and improved Siri functionality. One of the standout features of iOS 9 is its new multitasking capabilities for iPad. Users can now work with two apps concurrently, viewing them side-by-side. A Picture-in-Picture feature also allows for video playback while using other apps...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ios-9-has-been-released-by-apple/

item.title: The launch of ESET Smart Security 9 and ESET NOD32 Antivirus 9 has been announced
item.description:
ESET, a global cybersecurity company, has launched ESET Smart Security 9 and ESET NOD32 Antivirus 9. These releases feature a redesigned user interface and enhanced security features. Parvinder Walia, ESET’s Asia Pacific Sales and Marketing Director, highlighted the Asia-Pacific region’s rapid growth in internet and mobile usage, leading to increased adoption of online and mobile banking. He emphasized that the new banking and payment protection in ESET Smart Security 9 will allow customers to conduct secure financial transactions online...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-launch-of-eset-smart-security-9-and-eset-nod32-antivirus-9-has-been-announced/

item.title: The new version of Flickr is now available for iOS 9
item.description:
Yahoo’s Flickr app for iOS 9 now includes features designed for the updated operating system. Source: Yahoo. The app utilizes 3D Touch on the latest iPhones. This allows users to preview content by pressing lightly on the screen. For example, in the Camera Roll, lightly pressing a photo shows a preview, while a harder press expands it to full screen. Another 3D Touch feature, “Quick Actions,” lets users perform certain tasks directly from the app icon...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-new-version-of-flickr-is-now-available-for-ios-9/

item.title: HTC has released the Android-powered Nexus 9, with pre-orders starting on October 17th
item.description:
HTC teamed up with Google to create the Nexus 9, the first tablet to launch with Android Lollipop*. This premium tablet is designed for an exceptional user experience. The Nexus 9 allows for extensive customization and features a suite of secure login functions for enhanced security. Multi-tasking is made easy with this device. The tablet boasts an 8.9-inch display with a 4:3 aspect ratio, all within a sleek brushed aluminum frame...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/htc-has-released-the-android-powered-nexus-9-with-pre-orders-starting-on-october-17th/
